mapper.sql: id, owner, name, start_date, end_date, cost, description, create_time, create_by, edit_time, edit_by
mapper.select:
select ta.id,ta.name,tu1.name as owner,ta.start_date,ta.end_date,ta.edit_time, ta.cost,ta.description,ta.create_time,tu2.name as create_by,tu3.name as edit_by
order by create_time desc limit #{beginNo},#{pageSize}

select ta.id,ta.name,tu1.name as owner,ta.start_date,ta.end_date,ta.edit_time, ta.cost,ta.description,ta.create_time,tu2.name as create_by,tu3.name as edit_by from tbl_activity ta join tbl_user tu1 on ta.owner = tu1.id join tbl_user tu2 on ta.create_by = tu2.id left join tbl_user tu3 on ta.edit_by = tu3.id where 1
and ta.name like '%' #{name} '%'

select ta.id,tu1.name as owner,ta.name,ta.start_date,ta.end_date,ta.cost,ta.description, ta.create_time,tu2.name as create_by,ta.edit_time,tu3.name as edit_by from tbl_activity ta join tbl_user tu1 on ta.owner = tu1.id join tbl_user tu2 on ta.create_by = tu2.id left join tbl_user tu3 on ta.edit_by = tu3.id order by ta.create_time desc

select ta.id,tu1.name as owner,ta.name,ta.start_date,ta.end_date,ta.cost,ta.description, ta.create_time,tu2.name as create_by,ta.edit_time,tu3.name as edit_by from (select * from tbl_activity where id in
#{id} ) ta join tbl_user tu1 on ta.owner = tu1.id join tbl_user tu2 on ta.create_by = tu2.id left join tbl_user tu3 on ta.edit_by = tu3.id order by ta.create_time desc

select ta.id,ta.name,tu1.name as owner,ta.start_date,ta.end_date,ta.edit_time, ta.cost,ta.description,ta.create_time,tu2.name as create_by,tu3.name as edit_by from tbl_activity ta join tbl_user tu1 on ta.owner = tu1.id join tbl_user tu2 on ta.create_by = tu2.id left join tbl_user tu3 on ta.edit_by = tu3.id where ta.id not in ( select activity_id from tbl_clue_activity_relation where clue_id = #{clueId} )
and ta.name like '%' #{name} '%'

select ta.id,ta.name,tu1.name as owner,ta.start_date,ta.end_date,ta.edit_time, ta.cost,ta.description,ta.create_time,tu2.name as create_by,tu3.name as edit_by from tbl_activity ta join tbl_user tu1 on ta.owner = tu1.id join tbl_user tu2 on ta.create_by = tu2.id left join tbl_user tu3 on ta.edit_by = tu3.id where ta.id not in ( select activity_id from tbl_contacts_activity_relation where contacts_id = #{contactsId} )
and ta.name like '%' #{name} '%'

select tcar.id,ta.name,tu1.name as owner,ta.start_date,ta.end_date,ta.edit_time, ta.cost,ta.description,ta.create_time,tu2.name as create_by,tu3.name as edit_by from tbl_activity ta join (select * from tbl_clue_activity_relation where clue_id = #{clueId}) tcar on ta.id = activity_id join tbl_user tu1 on ta.owner = tu1.id join tbl_user tu2 on ta.create_by = tu2.id left join tbl_user tu3 on ta.edit_by = tu3.id

select tcar.id,ta.name,tu1.name as owner,ta.start_date,ta.end_date,ta.edit_time, ta.cost,ta.description,ta.create_time,tu2.name as create_by,tu3.name as edit_by from tbl_activity ta join (select * from tbl_contacts_activity_relation where contacts_id = #{contactsId}) tcar on ta.id = activity_id join tbl_user tu1 on ta.owner = tu1.id join tbl_user tu2 on ta.create_by = tu2.id left join tbl_user tu3 on ta.edit_by = tu3.id
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_activity (id, owner, name, start_date, end_date, cost, description, create_time, create_by, edit_time, edit_by) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{endDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{editTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

owner,

insert into tbl_activity(id, owner, name, start_date, end_date, cost, description, create_time, create_by) values (#{id},#{owner},#{name},#{startDate},#{endDate},#{cost},#{description},#{createTime},#{createBy})

insert into tbl_activity(id, owner, name, start_date, end_date, cost, description, create_time, create_by) values
(#{obj.id},#{obj.owner},#{obj.name},#{obj.startDate},#{obj.endDate},#{obj.cost},#{obj.description},#{obj.createTime},#{obj.createBy})
mapper.update:
update tbl_activity
owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
cost = #{cost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update tbl_activity set owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update tbl_activity set owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
